1.title: Prefacio: El éxtasis de Concha
1.plot: God appears to our protagonist, Mother Conchita, to give her a Holy Task. To open a web confessionary service on the internet to make money and save her convent from the current economic crisis.

2.title: Concha y el Objeto Sagrado
2.plot: Like Don Quixote before her, Madre Conchita confronts the giant that is her new computer, the Holy Object that God gave her. With the help of her mentally handicapped nephew, Tito, she will slowly learn to tame the beast that is technology. There once was an old woman who a computer she fought...

3.title: Ciber-Concha
3.plot: Madre Conchita interrupts her nephews sacred schedule in order to warn him that she was destined to surf the net. That it was in her blood! She also starts to dictate de introduction that later will be in the website he created for her to give confessions.

4.title: Habemus Monja
4.plot: Mother Conchita tries to solve her nephew's issues by making a mock-up confession. In the end she realizes that sometimes family matters should be kept private.

5.title: El gato volador
5.plot: Fluella, a maid who works in a big mansion, tells her experience of working with a cat that was apparently possessed and able to fly.

6.title: El señor de pelo blanco
6.plot: Mother Conchita hears the confession of a white-haired man whom she believes to be a terrorist because of the atrocities he reveals he's done. Then she finds out that the man is none other than Joseph Aloisius Ratzinger, or Benedict XVI.

locations: Queens, New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: The world is in economic crisis! Madre Conchita has found out that the Holy Father decided to cut them off from Rome and close their humble convent. Their only hope is if they are able to support themselves. In a visitation God tells her that the internet holds the key to save the convent, therefore, she decides to carry on confessions online through video chats in order to make some money. Conchita is determined to save this holy institution, and hopefully one day, be named Mother Superior. Since she has no knowledge of computers she seeks the help of her nephew Elton who is a janitor at the convent. He helps her set up www.webconfesionario.com This is where all the crazy characters in this world will go to find peace and redemption under Mother Conchita's guidance. ¡MADRE MÍA! Is a series with no scruples that will tackle many subjects about our society with dark humor and wit. The center and main attraction will be the actors and their characters. Definitely not for the faint of heart or the easily insulted!
imdb.title: ¡Madre Mía!
plot: A nun gives confession online.::Velvet Mafia Productions

The world is in economic crisis! Madre Conchita has found out that the Holy Father decided to cut them off from Rome and close their humble convent. Their only hope is if they are able to support themselves. In a visitation God tells her that the internet holds the key to save the convent, therefore, she decides to carry on confessions online through video chats in order to make some money. Conchita is determined to save this holy institution, and hopefully one day, be named Mother Superior. Since she has no knowledge of computers she seeks the help of her nephew Elton who is a janitor at the convent.
